Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, Chicago, Green, Erie, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/Chicago

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Chicago, Green, Erie, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/Chicago.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
